nodes.text: Ojim Srellq was a male individual who was a member of the Metatheran Cartel during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Circa 31 BBY, a number of Srellq's cargo shipments were stolen by the Rock Rogues, a pirate group that operated in the Cularin system. In response, Srellq hired the Chagrian bounty hunter Koll Jovas to find who had taken the cargo and recover the missing items.
